predicate.note: Frames file for 'revoke' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: Drexel says [0] it does n't expect [0] any of its state brokerage licenses will be revoked [*-1] , and even if some are [*?*] , its securities business would n't be directly hurt [*-2] .
example.arg: [*-1] -> any of its state brokerage licenses

example.name: transitive
example.text: Connecticut already has issued a `` notice of intent '' [*] to revoke Drexel 's brokerage license .
